description: Following a scramble in the box, a Red team player scores from a loose ball.
The Black team plays a cross into the box, and a Red team defender's defensive header goes into their own net for an own goal.
Black team scores directly from a free-kick taken just outside the penalty area.
Following a restart, the Black team launches a quick attack, resulting in a goal from a shot.
Black team scores from a free kick that was crossed into the box and headed into the goal.
